info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 24 at 2:55PM PDT until August 24 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Western Clark County in southern Nevada... Southern Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 400 PM PDT. * At 252 PM PDT, a wall of dust was 12 miles west of Mountain Springs, or 16 miles southwest of Red Rock Canyon, and is moving northwest. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Locations impacted include Pahrump, NV 160 and NV 372. Locations impacted include... Pahrump. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
